summary_short: Contemporary art museum in Aspen with rotating exhibitions; current listings include Glenn Ligon, Shahryar Nashat, Jacqueline Humphries, and Victoria Colmegna.
summary_long: Aspen Art Museum is an art museum focused on contemporary programming, highlighted by a schedule of rotating exhibitions. Upcoming/ongoing listings include solo presentations by Glenn Ligon (Nov 21, 2025–Mar 15, 2026), Shahryar Nashat (Nov 21, 2025–Apr 26, 2026), Jacqueline Humphries (Dec 12, 2025–Apr 5, 2026), and Victoria Colmegna (Dec 12, 2025–Mar 29, 2026). Plan roughly a half-day visit to see exhibitions at a comfortable pace.

collection_highlights.title: Rotating contemporary exhibitions program
collection_highlights.description: Exhibition listings indicate an active schedule of contemporary solo shows across late 2025–spring 2026.

collection_highlights.title: Shahryar Nashat: Raw Is the Red (Nov 21, 2025–Apr 26, 2026)

visitor_tips: Allocate about a half day to see the exhibitions without rushing.
Check the museum’s exhibition schedule in advance; multiple shows can overlap with different end dates.
If you have limited time, prioritize the exhibitions with earlier closing dates.
